title: A Design for a Mirrored Slipcase for Les Dernières Merveilles de la science (A Children’s Book Published by Garnier Frères circa 1900)
medium: Wood, aluminium, glass, 6 lithographs on paper mounted onto board and screenprint on paper
dimensions:
image, each: 260 x 205 mm
support, each: 437 x 340 mm
object: 500 x 4200 x 750 mm
